ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
                
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>
data.data||data.list||book_list||data.publication_list||data.result||data
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name||$.bookName

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
function deviceType() {
  try {
    return !!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType() ? 'android' : 'ios';
java.put("dev", device)
let url = baseUrl?.match(/&ts=([^&]*)/)?.[1] || null;

// ç›´æ¥æ ¹æ® url å’Œè®¾å¤‡ç±»å‹åˆ¤æ–­æ¨¡å¼å¹¶èµ‹å€¼  
if (device === 'android') {  
  if (url === "å¬ä¹¦") {  
    book.type = 32;  
    java.longToast("å·²è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºå¬ä¹¦!");  
  } else if (url === "æ¼«ç”»") {  
    book.type = 64;  
    java.longToast("å·²è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºæ¼«ç”»!");  
  } else {  
    book.type = 8;  // å®‰å“æ™®é€šé˜…è¯»æ¨¡å¼  
  }  
} else if (device === 'ios') {  
  if (url === "å¬ä¹¦") {  
    book.type = 1;  
    java.longToast("å·²è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºå¬ä¹¦!");  
  } else if (url === "æ¼«ç”»") {  
    book.type = 2;  
    java.longToast("å·²è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºæ¼«ç”»!");  
  } else if (url === "çŸ­å‰§") {  
    book.type = 3;  
    java.longToast("å·²è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ‡æ¢ä¸ºè§†é¢‘!");  
  }else {  
    book.type = 0;  // iOS æ™®é€šé˜…è¯»æ¨¡å¼  
  }  
}

let bid = baseUrl.match(/\?(fq|qm)_id=([^&]*)/)?.[2]
if (book.bookUrl.includes("fq_id")){
	var type = "fqbzpl"
	var cname = "item_id"
	} else if (book.bookUrl.includes("qm_id")) {
		var type = "qmbzpl"
		var cname = "chapter_id"
		}




JSON.parse(result).data.lists.map((x) => {
    let match = x.url.match(/item_id=([^&]+)|chapterId=\d+-(\d+)/);
let cid = match ? (match[1] || match[2]) : null;
    x.url = `data:chapterUrl;base64,${java.base64Encode(
        x.url
    )},{"type":"","js":"book ? result :'${source.bookSourceUrl}${type}?book_id=${bid}&${cname}=${cid}&version=${x.version?? ""}&sessionid=${ck()}&key=${Map("å¯†é’¥")}'"}`;

   return x;
});
</js>
